text: The Learned Ladies () is a five-act play by Molière. It was first performed on March 11, 1672 at Théâtre du Palais-Royal. It is a satire written in verse about women's education. ==Other websites== *"Les Femmes Savantes" Original French Text *"The Learned Women" English translation on Project Gutenberg Category:Plays by Molière Category:1670s plays
title: The Learned Ladies
